about_the_game:
Get a Giant Pointing Arrow that points at you!


Ever felt like the other side maybe didn't know where exactly to look? Well, now YOU can point the way! That's right! With the Giant Pointing Arrow your location will be undeniable to the rest of the world! Watch it light up and clearly define where you are!


*We are not responsible for the inevitably horrific realization that the Giant Pointing arrow does not affect the way you are perceived by others in any way shape or form*



THIS DLC HAS NO EFFECT ON GAMEPLAY AND SIMPLY EXISTS TO SUPPORT THE DEVELOPER
